import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a new S3 bucket connector</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/log-shipping/s3-buckets"}></MethodEndpoint>



Establishes a new connection of the Logz.io fetcher to an AWS S3 bucket. As a result, logs from your AWS resource will begin shipping to the connected Logz.io account via an AWS S3 bucket.

Logs will be parsed using the Logz.io custom parsing pipeline for the resource. <br /> 
*Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.*


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accessKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket access key","example":"ee07df5801500745419c6dff"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"secretKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket secret key","example":"506d891fe2163a511b450eddc3279539f6"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"arn"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to uniquely identify the S3 bucket. To generate a new ARN, create a new IAM Role in your AWS admin console."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"bucket"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket name","example":"AWS bucket"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"prefix"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Prefix of the AWS S3 bucket","example":"AWSLogs/7364988021587/myprefix"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"active"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"If `true`, the S3 bucket connector is active and logs are being shipped to Logz.io. If `false`, the connector is disabled.","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"addS3ObjectKeyAsLogField"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"If `true`, enriches logs with a new field detailing the S3 object key.","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"region"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`US_EAST_1`, `US_EAST_2`, `US_WEST_1`, `US_WEST_2`, `EU_WEST_1`, `EU_WEST_2`, `EU_WEST_3`, `EU_CENTRAL_1`, `AP_NORTHEAST_1`, `AP_NORTHEAST_2`, `AP_SOUTHEAST_1`, `AP_SOUTHEAST_2`, `SA_EAST_1`, `AP_SOUTH_1`, `CA_CENTRAL_1`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Specify one supported AWS region.","enum":["US_EAST_1","US_EAST_2","US_WEST_1","US_WEST_2","EU_WEST_1","EU_WEST_2","EU_WEST_3","EU_CENTRAL_1","AP_NORTHEAST_1","AP_NORTHEAST_2","AP_SOUTHEAST_1","AP_SOUTHEAST_2","SA_EAST_1","AP_SOUTH_1","CA_CENTRAL_1"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"logsType"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`elb`, `vpcflow`, `S3Access`, `cloudfront`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["elb","vpcflow","S3Access","cloudfront"],"description":"Specify the log type you will be sending to Logz.io. As a result, Logz.io will apply the appropriate parsing pipeline. [Learn more about parsing options supported by Logz.io](/user-guide/log-shipping/built-in-log-types.html).","example":"elb"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div>

successful operation
